body: I don't think you can change SimpleFold to ToLower in regexp. I suspect that would break case-insensitive regexps over characters like "kKâ„ª" (little k, big k, Kelvin symbol)? But no, ToLower of kelvin symbol is lowercase 'k'.... http://play.golang.org/p/pqhR4ksOk_ But maybe there are other characters which SimpleFold to each other but don't map to the same ToLower character? You could brute force all the characters (or characters in the defined ranges) and see?
